content: Turning to financial guidance for the fiscal year 2022, we are reaffirming our revenue guidance of $115 million to $125 million, and reducing our estimate for adjusted operating income from our operations segment to between breakeven and $3 million as a result of the impacts of the COVID-19 Delta variant on live events, inclement weather and our long-term investments in original and exclusive content and franchises as well as continue our increased spend on marketing associated with driving new paid memberships.
